title: Add Figma design link to navigation

requirements.summary: Add a navigation link to the Figma design site that opens in a new tab
acceptanceCriteria: The link appears in the main navigation menu alongside existing links
Clicking the link opens https://formal-trend-62662413.figma.site in a new browser tab
The link is visible on both desktop and mobile navigation views

file_operations.description: Add a new navigation link to https://formal-trend-62662413.figma.site following the same pattern as the existing 'Reflect & Create' external link. The link should appear in both the desktop navigation list and mobile sheet navigation, positioned after existing navigation items. Use target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer' for security. Style consistently with the existing external link pattern, using appropriate visual indicators (such as ExternalLink icon) to show it opens in a new tab. Ensure the link text is descriptive (e.g., 'Design Inspiration' or 'Figma Design') and maintains the navigation's existing styling patterns.
